full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**
### Collection ID: SSC-22-00021260:T
### Solicitation Number: BPM017506/21260

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contract to procure 1000 units of [Jabra Biz 2300 USB Mono MS PTT Headsets] and 1000 units of [Jabra Biz 2300 USB Stereo MS PTT Headsets] for its staff.

### Tender Description

* The RCMP requires a reliable and high-quality headset solution to meet the communication needs of its officers and staff.
* The headsets must be compatible with the RCMP's existing communication systems and meet specific technical requirements.
* The delivery destination is Ottawa, Ontario, with a required delivery date of 60 working federal government days from contract award.
* Security requirements are specified as N/A (Not Applicable).

### Evaluation Criteria

* The contract award will be based on a competitive, open-bidding process.
* The evaluation will consider the terms of the contract, technical capabilities of the suppliers, and pricing.
* The contract will be awarded to the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price.

### Solicitation Details

* The solicitation reference number is SSC-22-00021260:T.
* The public tender closing date is January 9th, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time).
* Suppliers must submit their bids through the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) website using the Supplier Registration Information (SRI) portal.

### Contact Information

* Michael Boualavong
	+ Junior Procurement Officer
	+ Shared Services Canada
	+ 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
	+ Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2N1
	+ Phone: (613) 402-8895
	+ Email: [michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

### Important Details

* Suppliers must ensure compliance with government purchasing policies and regulations.
* All inquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to the contact above.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. 
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate the procurement with suppliers on any procurement. 
* For more information, please visit the PSPC website.
